articles.title: Skateboarding Fleetwood Mac TikToker Nathan Apodaca now on Hulu show - Insider
articles.description: Nathan Apodaca's TikTok lip sync to Fleetwood Mac's "Dreams" garnered millions of views and hundreds of copycats. Now, he's on a TV show.
